sermult.h

Classes

SerBoothMult8 -- (full description)
ModBoothMult8 -- (full description)

class SerBoothMult8 : public PMtop

Interface

Public Members
SerBoothMult8( WireVector<Bool, INPUT_WIDTH>& In, Bool& MP_load, Bool& MP_shift, Bool& MC_load, WireVector<Bool,2>& MPSerIn, Bool& AdderReset, Bool *clock=NULL, const char *name=NULL): PMtop(clock,name)
void out(WireVector<Bool, INPUT_WIDTH>& Out, WireVector<Bool, 2>& MPOut)
void place()
void place(int x, int y)

Description

SerBooth8: serial radix 2 booth multiplier
THROUGHPUT: 1 mult / 5 cycles
AREA: about 4 columns 5 rows (20 CLBs)

remark: Multiplier is loaded in two ways
parallel (8 bit) & serial (4bits)

Member Description

SerBoothMult8( WireVector<Bool, INPUT_WIDTH>& In, Bool& MP_load, Bool& MP_shift, Bool& MC_load, WireVector<Bool,2>& MPSerIn, Bool& AdderReset, Bool *clock=NULL, const char *name=NULL): PMtop(clock,name)

void place(int x, int y)

class ModBoothMult8: public PMtop

Interface

ModBoothMult8( WireVector<Bool, INPUT_WIDTH>& In, WireVector<Bool, 4>& MPshift_In, Bool& MP_load, Bool& MP_shift, Bool& MC_load, Bool& write_enable, Bool& del_write_enable, Bool& load, WireVector<Bus, 3> &addr1, WireVector<Bus, 3> &addr2, Bool *clock=NULL, const char *name=NULL): PMtop(clock,name)
void out(WireVector<Bool, INPUT_WIDTH>& Out, WireVector<Bool, 4>& MPshiftOut)
void place()
void place(int x, int y)

Description

ModBoothMult8: modified serial radix 2 booth multiplier
THROUGHPUT: 1 mult / 2 cycles
AREA: about 7 columns 5 rows (35 clbs)

remark: Multiplier is loaded in two ways
parallel(8bits) & serial(4 bits)

Member Description

ModBoothMult8( WireVector<Bool, INPUT_WIDTH>& In, WireVector<Bool, 4>& MPshift_In, Bool& MP_load, Bool& MP_shift, Bool& MC_load, Bool& write_enable, Bool& del_write_enable, Bool& load, WireVector<Bus, 3> &addr1, WireVector<Bus, 3> &addr2, Bool *clock=NULL, const char *name=NULL): PMtop(clock,name)

void out(WireVector<Bool, INPUT_WIDTH>& Out, WireVector<Bool, 4>& MPshiftOut)

void place()

void place(int x, int y)

end placement
